description: This file implements a React component for a multi-step connection wizard in a Next.js application. It manages user flow for selecting connectors, choosing authentication methods (OAuth or API key), initiating auth flows, and validating the connection. It includes UI elements, state management, and API calls to backend functions.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A styled container component for sections of the wizard.

methods.name: SectionTitle
methods.description: Component for section headings within the wizard.

methods.name: ConnectorGrid
methods.description: Displays a grid of connector options, allowing selection.

methods.name: AuthMethodSelect
methods.description: Component letting users select between OAuth and API key authentication.

methods.name: TextField
methods.description: Reusable input component for text data entry.

methods.name: FooterNav
methods.description: Navigation buttons for moving between wizard steps.

methods.name: InfoBanner
methods.description: Displays informational messages to the user.

methods.name: SkeletonConnectorList
methods.description: Placeholder skeleton UI for loading state.

methods.name: Progress
methods.description: Progress indicator showing current wizard step.
